document.topic_text: Updated: August 12, 2016 10:42 IST Meeting Tweet Entrepreneurship Development Institute of Tamil Nadu and Chennai Chapter of The Indus Entrepreneurs will conduct a networking meet for entrepreneurs under the New Entrepreneurs Enterprise Development Scheme. The meeting will be held here on August 12 at PSG STEP. An expert will speak on import and export regulations. The network session will be broadcast on the institute’s websitewww.editn.in According to a release, such meetings are held so that entrepreneurs network and learn from each other. It is held on the second Friday of every month. For details, contact: 8754590961 or 9042912812. Dry day In view of Independence Day celebration, August 15 will be observed as a liquor-free dry day. Liquor outlets, bars and persons selling liquor on that day will be penalised.
